title: TheServant[1963]
description:
Director: Joseph Losey

Duration: 112 min

Subtitles: Portuguese and Spanish

Plot: The aristocratic Tony moves to London and hires the servant Hugo Barrett for all services at home. Barrett seems to be a loyal and competent employee, but Tony&#039;s girlfriend Susan does not like him and asks Tony to send him away. When Barrett brings his sister Vera to work and live in the house, Tony has a brief hidden affair with her. After traveling with Susan for spending a couple of days in a friend&#039;s house outside London, the couple unexpectedly returns and finds Barrett and Vera, who are actually lovers, in Tony&#039;s room. They are fired and Susan breaks with Tony. Later, Tony meets Barrett alone in a pub and hires him back, and Barrett imposes his real dark intentions in the house, turning the table and switching position with his master (Written by Claudio Carvalho).

Cast: Dirk Bogarde (Hugo Barrett), James Fox (Tony), Sarah Miles (Vera), Wendy Craig (Susan), Catherine Lacey (Lady Mounset) and Richard Vernon (Lord Mounset).
